original_title: Cool Daddio: The Second Youth of R. Stevie Moore
overview: R Stevie Moore has been a reclusive figure for over 40 years, recording over 400 albums in his bedroom. For the first time, we go on the road to discover the truth behind the myth as we jump inside the crazy, chaotic world of R Stevie Moore.
tagline: The greatest musician you've never heard of... until now.
title: Cool Daddio: The Second Youth of R. Stevie Moore
